Detailed Description

The MDI widget we use in BibleTime.

Enhances QWorkspace.

Author(s):
The BibleTime Team

Member Function Documentation

void CMDIArea::lookupInLexicon ( const QString & text,
const QString & module ) [slot]

Look up the text in the module.

If the module has already a display window of it opne use it, otherwise create a new one.
